articles.author: James Hibberd
articles.title: ‘The Last of Us’ Co-Creator Neil Druckmann to Exit HBO Series - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The co-showrunner is departing the hit series which he made with Craig Mazin after a divisive season 2.
articles.content:
A show known for its devastating character departures now has a big one behind the scenes: The Last of Usco-showrunner Neil Druckmann is exiting the HBO hit series. 
The move leaves his co-creator C… [+2603 chars]
